title: Telehealth Tips: How To Make The Most Of Video Visits With Your Doctor
description: A visit to the doctor's office looks a little different during the pandemic. Doctors are using telemedicine services to treat patients more frequently. In this episode, Dr. Mara Gordon provides tips to help you get the most out of your telehealth visit.
